place_description: Cheery regional coffeehouse chain serving specialty drinks, smoothies & baked goods.

reviews_data.review_text: Coffee is ok but never try the GOOD TO GO at this place because they will just give you couple cups of coffee ONLY so not worth it

Omg i love this place. I don't even drink coffee that much but since they moved in to town I'm there two to three times a week. I love the frozen teddy bear or butter bear and the everything turkey cheese bagel is delicious. On top of that the customer service has always been above and beyond. You have a great team working there.
Cute little walkable spot for McCullough neighborhood!
Expensive.   But very good.  Clean

Wanted to say that Melissa at Biggby Coffee in Pineville cares about giving back to her local community as she donates to help out a little league team in Pineville thru Hope Soccer.  On behalf of Hope Soccer, we are very grateful for the impact Biggby has on our local kids! As a consumer of any service, I know that I look for businesses who are involved in their local community, such as Biggby Coffee! Also, I can tell you personally that their coffee and their bagel sandwiches are great!  Highly recommend!
Supper good whenever we go out of town we look for a biggby coffee it never disappoints this location was definitely my favorite staff was amazing thank you so much for everything

Visited recently because I got an ad on Facebook and it's so close to my house. I always love trying new coffee shops even though it can be hit or miss. This was definitely a hit though! I love that my latte has a nice sweet flavor while also being able to taste the espresso. I think they do a fantastic job balancing the sweetener to coffee ratio. I ordered a caramel marshmallow iced latte and loved it.

My boyfriend stopped in to grab us coffee again today and I got the same drink, and it tasted the same as when I got it the other day so they're definitely consistent. We also tried the donut holes last time we visited, and those were great too.

The staff was super friendly and chatty with customers which is always nice to see anywhere you go. We will definitely come again in the future and make this our new go to spot.
Had a very pleasant experience visiting Biggby Coffee this morning! Customer service was phenomenal and very quick. The coffee itself was even better. Will definitely be coming back soon!

Ordered through DoorDash and was pleasantly surprised. The cold brew was incredible and the bagel was just as amazing, if not better! I love that they serve their bagels into the afternoon, most places don't do that.

Disappointed with the coffee at the Waffle House, I headed here and spent an hour this morning sipping away at a small coffee that was actually the size of a small oil drum while I wrote a couple Yelp reviews. There's a very comfy single-seat booth in the back that was pretty darned awesome with a power outlet and a nice view of the comings and goings.

The coffee was excellent and the space was lovely.

This Bigby is located near my house and I can walk from my house to this place. I've been coming here almost over a year now since it was first open back in February 2023 the price is affordable and will meet your budget needs like other coffee chains.

So many new faces they don't seemed like they are getting proper training...

Edit-  I had never said that the service, food or drinks were bad I just said that there was a lot of new faces!
Best coffee. Best customer service  By far my favorite place for coffee. Different special every day.
Super friendly staff, great drinks, and good value.
Picked up an order from here
Great Drinks! I ordered a Carmel sweet cream cold brew and it was delicious! The staff is super friendly and quick!
The Cinnabuzz Matcha Latte was a tasty twist to traditional Matcha! Yum!! The staff was delightful and service was quick!

We stopped here after visiting the nearby flea market, the experience was all around MID. The time it took to prepare beverages (4) was absurd and when we got them they didn't even taste like anything .

Very slow service, and they were not packed at all. I would definitely not go here during a rush hour time or if I had something else to do immediately after, which one of the people in my party ended up being late for work because we didn't know it would take upwards of 35mins to get a drink.

The flavor just wasn't there either.
The BEST cold foam ever. Very sweet staff and I'm so glad that they have weekly deals!
Biggby coffee in pineville is one of our families favorites! The staff is wonderful and the coffee tastes great.
Great coffee and some yummy doughnuts
Always an awesome treat I get 2-3 times a week, excellent staff and smiles all around, love biggby coffee !!

Tired of weak Dunkin? Weary of burnt Starbucks? Biggby coffee is fresh and smooth! They carry everything from traditional blends to very creative latte drinks. The atmosphere is welcoming and friendly - if a bit small. Highly recommend!
This place is incredible! Great customer service, great environment, and super clean store! The drinks are incredible and always so yummy! Support your local business!!

I've been to this location multiple times, and the menu looks so exciting with multiple flavor options and most of them available in sugar free. I love creative mixes for my lattes, but it always falls very flat here. At Starbucks, they lack variety especially in sugar-free, but when they put syrup in you can taste it. You can taste it too much and as a matter of fact at Starbucks I always tell them to do half of the amount of syrup they normally do, so I'm not a person that likes an over sugary and syrupy drink. I'm writing this review because at this location, even though they have such cool interesting sounding drinks, you can't taste the syrup at all. It tastes like drinking espresso with warmed milk and a little tiny bit of sweetener, but no flavor whatsoever. I guess if I return to try their coffee, I'm going to have to ask for additional pumps and then watch it be too sweet would be my luck. Again, I'm really happy with all the flavor combinations offered here but you can't taste it.
Great place for coffee, and very friendly staff.
Great coffee!
Fabulous customer service. We were first timers and the young lady explained the different drinks and answered all of our questions. Definitely will be back and will spread the word.

Stopped by here on the way home from work mainly because of the location and drive thru option. I ordered an iced vanilla latte and I wasn't a fan. Their espresso is a little too strong for my taste. It wasn't a good blend for me. I'm not gonna write off the place because some people like strong coffee, it just wasn't for me!
The coffee is great and the staff is even nicer. Really a great place to see how a business should be ran

The drink I had was amazing!! Hands down better than most. The Asiago bagel with cream cheese was tough to chew and fairly dry. I wish I could have had more cream cheese because I could barely taste it. From now on I will just order the frozen coffee
Great Food, Great Coffee. Wonderful doordash experience with a personal note inside.
Friendly staff, exceptionally clean store. Conveniently located minutes from Carolina Place Mall.
I order from door dash all the time because the quality of the food is excellent and the coffee is delicious!
Clean, modern, bright coffee shop with very friendly staff and decent coffee. Has a drive through also.

So, this is only my second review ever, I don't usually do this but it's almost been a year they've been open and they deserve this! I've gone to Biggby for years back home (was so excited when they opened here!!) and have been in love with their sweet foam cold brew which is the best ever made, hands down! What makes the experience the best is the people here. John and Melissa are amazing and go above and beyond to make sure everyone is happy and enjoying their coffee (even when I can be a pain!) and you build a relationship with the rest of the staff when you go every day. They treat you like family and you know each other on a first name basis, which you don't get very often in the world. Everyone I bring coffee to at my work absolutely loves their coffee and they all look forward to $5 Friday! I would give them 100 stars if I could but I'm limited to 5 so I will end with this... I love Biggby coffee no matter where I go but what makes this one special and the absolute best is the owners and the people who are making our coffee everyday. I appreciate y'all and thank y'all for everything!
I love getting coffee here before going to the Miller flea market next to it

We had an overall good experience here. The place is clean and tidy. Very minimalist approach. Coffee specialty drinks were a wild array of offerings. They offered a strawberry coffee and it was not good at all. It was unexpectedly bitter.

The chai is great with oat milk. The teddy bear, half-swedt, was good, according to my wife. We haven't purchased food here yet, so I can't speak for that.

CX service was excellent! Everyone was friendly, attentive, and patient. Drinks came up quickly, too!
Had a coffee and bagel very good and very welcoming staff will be back!

Great coffee not too sweet but still yummy

Great service with a smile...

Hubs and I came in and had no idea what to order huge menu with the ability to customize your drink. And they aren't snobs like some other places here in Charlotte.

Friendly faces in a quiet but cozy atmosphere! Def coming back
Love the Citrus Snow Latte
Ordered a peppermint stick mocha and it has no coffee flavor, all milk with a hint of peppermint. Coffee was disgusting and I ended up pouring it out. 1st and last visit

Mediocre is being nice.  Smallest size of coffee is 16 ounces.  Guess what I got in my cappuccino, one shot of espresso and 13 ounces of warm milk.   Mmmm I love warm milk and barely a hint of coffee.  Ordered an extra toasted bagel and cream cheese, guess what I got.  A chewy basic grocery store bagel that had not one bit of toastiness to it and NO cream cheese. Didnt figure this out until I was down the road or i would have asked for a refund.
Unclear what their business model is but someone needs to revisit it.
Perfect spot to grab coffee and something for breakfast/lunch. Large assortment of beverages making it better than Starbucks. Love their taxedo muffin and donut holes.
What a neat place!  First time visit, EXCELLENT coffee and friendly service.  Do yourself a favor and check them out.
Excellent service we would come more often but I would be broke all the time lol
Best & most hospitable coffeshop management ever!
Amazing!!
Extremely clean - my food and coffee were great! Staff was super friendly.
The cold brew here is my favorite especially with some sweet foam. The staff here is engaging and makes every experience personable.

Glad to have Biggby in the area. The Coffee is great, and the food is delicious! It's nice being able to customize any drink/flavors. What really makes this place special are the amazing staff and owners!!
Absolutely delicious!
I loved this place! I ordered 3 drinks and a food beverage and they were delicious. The workers there were very nice and would recommend this place to anyone if all ages!
New and clean

The place was desolate, but I figured I would check it out anyway. They loaded my lattee with whipped cream and that was my first sign they were hiding the taste of the coffee, but it was horrible. Tasted burnt and old like it was just coffee that had been sitting there for days. Not impressed. The only reason I gave two stars was because the barista that helped me was very sweet, but I tossed the $7 coffee in the trash at my next stop.

I'm a military veteran also military veteran discounts. I'm a business owner myself I own Fort Mill auto pros which is a commercial detailing business but also paint and dent and automotive repair. Also I come here daily after 1 o'clock in the afternoon which is pretty quiet staff is really polite great atmosphere coffee is not bad. It's fresh every single time. Also they do military discounts. I highly recommend BIGGBY COFFEE to get a quick cuppa coffee and something to eat. John and Melissa are the owners of this business in this location. Great people to talk too
The coffee is the best. They also offer donuts and a Cuban sandwich. All in all I look forward to my coffee and catching up with the service staff. I feel welcomed every time.
I'm addicted to the sweet foam cold brew! It's soooooo good and the service here has already been above and beyond!
Great service. Excellent food.
This is the only coffee shop I go to now, due to how great the food, drinks, and exceptional attitudes from the staff are.
Excellent coffee and bagels. Special deals almost every day of the week!!

I've tried this spot 3x and in my experience it is extremely inconsistent. The first visit there I ordered a unsweetened vanilla iced coffee & a bagel with cream cheese. I didn't realize until I was in route to work so I had no time to go back but the vanilla was not unsweetened and no straw was provided. To add to that, there was barely ANY cream cheese so I essentially just got a bagel with no topping.  I chalked it up to a one time thing and returned a couple days later. Today, I got an everything bagel with bacon egg and cheese. I struggled to get a bite out of it it was so hard. Oddly enough, the bottom was salvageable and I was able to eat that but the top was so hard it made my teeth hurt. I'm not sure if the bagels were stale or what but I've never had an experience like that with a bagel. Too many inconsistencies.
Great place to hang out.
Great customer service!
Haven't tried the food yet but I've been here about 15 time now and I love the red bull mocktail drinks. I like that it's not just coffee and it's way cheaper than a Starbucks

Service was amazing. Super friendly staff. Delicious coffee, smoothies and teas.
6th start for my coffee was not only delicious, it was hot enough to drink as soon as they hand it to me. Your every other corner coffee shop have to wait at least 10 min to drink it not to burn my mouth.
Amazing staff and good coffee! Very clean and refreshing atmosphere.
I love trying new coffee shops, and I'm so glad I tried the butter bear iced latte today. It was delicious! I will be back again.
Always great service!

Whoever is making drinks in the morning of 7/22/23 needs to pay better attention to DoorDash. I reordered my coffee THREE TIMES because I ordered an iced coffee and it showed up hot I even made sure my receipt said iced coffee and not hot (note we don't have ice at work so I can't just plop ice cubes in there) it's extremely irritating especially when the coffee order is like 10 dollars and I only get 3 dollars back in DoorDash credits. Which means I paid almost thirty dollars for someone to get my coffee order right. That's ridiculous.
Perfectly blended drinks
Super clean, friendly and wonderful coffee stop!  Highly recommend!

Stopped by when I was in the area, traveling for business. We don't have Biggby locations in Asheville where I'm from. But when I'm in Charlotte or the surrounding area, I'll be back!! Such a tremendous variety of coffee and other drinks. There are options even if you don't want a coffee-based drink!! Both my coworker and I were very satisfied. I tried both the "campfire" cold brew and also another blue raspberry flavored drink with crystal boba. Really can't wait to go back!
drinks are so good food is good veryyyy underrated the workers are so nice 1000000/10
Really good breakfast sandwiches

Went here mid week just after 1pm, so there weren't many people there. Service was excellent. We got smoothies (creme freezes they call them) and they were awesome! Not overly expensive, great taste, and great value. They have a great selection of drinks, hot and cold, as well as pastries and even some food items, mainly sandwiches and breakfast items. The location is still relatively new so everything was super clean and in great condition. We went inside to order and there are plenty of seats and tables. There is a drive-thru but we didn't use it. Biggby Coffee is a refreshing and delightful change from other coffee shops. I'll stop by again in the future.
Much needed coffee shop around the area. Something different... staff is great, coffee is good. Worth checking out
The best coffee shop in metro Charlotte for sure. Great coffee and excellent service. Also, reasonably priced.

Randomly stopped by when I was in an area of town I normally don't visit.  Great tasting coffee and quick service.  I hope they open one near me.  So much better than the burnt bitter coffee from Starbucks.
Outstanding coffee shop- great coffee, muffins, and service. Will be back!
It's the best new spot in Pineville. This place is fantastic, and I would love to see new spots open up in the Charlotte area!
A favorite place to get a snack and hang out with my Grandson!

I'm from up north where Biggby has its roots so I was thrilled to see one in my new home state! The matcha is my favorite!! And the bragels are perfect for breakfast on the road. Quick service and friendly staff, too

Nice place .
New taste of drinks.
Amazing staff, WONDERFUL DRINKS (Caramel Marvel - HIGHLY RECOMMEND) and a great atmosphere. Check it out!

Came in this morning and was met by Sarah at the window. The drive through option is so convenient. The customer service is what really made the experience stand out. Sarah was very inviting and gave me some great info on the shop. Took the time to ask my name and make it a personal experience. This is SO rare these days! If I owned a business I would want 12 Sarah's working for me, LOL!!

My honey, cinnamon, vanilla lattee with just 2% added was great & strong. I highly recommend this coffee shop!

I have spent most of my childhood in the McCullough neighborhood. I was off at college when I found out about Biggby Coffee opening up. I was overjoyed, ecstatic, whatever adjective you want to use. My first time was very pleasant. I highly recommend the strawberry banana smoothie. They constantly have specials throughout the week. I will definitely be back
Really good coffee and great service. Definitely come check this place out
Luv it!!!!  Very fast and friendly...fresh food...
Yummy bagel sandwiches and great for coffee lovers!
I think I just don't like the taste of their espresso beans. Good customer service though.
So happy this place is open. Everything is great! I even buy a whole box of tea to take home!
Really enjoyed the cookies and cream freeze A must try ( try adding a shot or two of espresso)
Great new coffee house!  Yummy bagels, too!
Great coffee, great people, great service! Love this new coffee spot, so much better than the larger chains in the area!

WOW! I stopped for an iced latte and a "bragel" breakfast sandwich this morning, and I will definitely be back! Aside from the coffee/food being incredible, the customer service was amazing! Highly recommend stopping by!

This biggby is the first one in the south here that I know of... just as good and/or better than most large chain coffee.  They like to branch outside of the normal coffee and latte offerings.  Their chocolate is very rich, their drinks are very unique.  It's like Starbucks but with a more custom feel straight off the menu
The lady's who work here are so friendly, the coffee/food are great. The service is the absolute best. Highly recommend this place.

So awesome to see a Bigby Coffee in the Charlotte area. Fell in love with these in recent road trips through Ohio & Michigan. Great coffee, good bagels sandwiches, and great service at this new locations. Owners are very involved and great atmosphere. Hope to see Bigby Coffee succeed in North Carolina.
Food and drinks are delicious, customer service is always great
Great coffee, great customer service. Melissa and John are very nice and two of my favorite people to see between 6-7am. They always have a smile and start my mornings off great. Unique flavors also!
Friendly staff, delicious coffee and yummy bagels! Will definitely be back
Great coffee and amazing customer service!
I've never tasted such smooth tasting coffee from a franchisee place... Impressed! Keep it up you all
Very good and flavorful coffee
Love Biggby!!! So happy they opened one down in NC!!!
They just opened so they're training the staff still. But I had a bourbon brown sugar coffee (black unsweet) that was incredible in the AM
I had the golden honey Chai. It was delicious.
Will be coming here instead of any other coffee shop! The service was fast, super friendly staff, and great coffee with lots of options.
Awesome environment and really good coffee! The service was excellent especially for a grand opening.

Biggby Coffee has amazing, unique coffee options with a flavor that I enjoy more than Starbucks. I ordered the bear cub and it was delish! This location just opened today with the most friendly franchisees I've ever met and they've hired an amazingly friendly staff. I look forward to many a caffeinated beverage and bragel!

The environment inside has some comfortable seating, but I wouldn't say it has the same atmosphere as a Starbucks or local coffee shop where you would go to study or work. It's somewhere in between a DD and a Starbucks. Delicious food and coffee is their strong point.
Great coffee and friendly staff
